title: My life so far
name: My life so far
description:
A Map by Gary1974

Everywhere I have been so far......

properties.name: Chris + Helen's House
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974A five minute walk from where Dan and I live - ideal staggering home distance afer a night on the piss. Chris and Helen also live in a terraced house with their rat Toby. I have known Chris for 5 years ish, when he joined the company for whom I still work.

properties.name: Dan's Mum lives here
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974Dan\'s mum, Julie, has lived here since 2005 with Dan\'s brother and sister - Steven and Rachael. With the amount of time he spends there, it could be argued that Dan\'s dad, Eric, lives there as well, though I am sure Julie would beg to differ.....

properties.name: Dan's Nan lives here
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974Dan\'s Nan & Grandad live here, and have done since time began.....

properties.name: Marmaris
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974Marmaris, Turkey

properties.name: Marmaris, Turkey
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974

properties.name: My Brother lives here
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974My brother, Ian, moved to Scotland around 3 years ago. With his ginger hair, you could say that it is his spiritual home :-). He now manages two gift shops on the Royal Mile

properties.name: My Nan lives here
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974My Nan has lived here for well over 50 years - in fact she has lived there so long, that the council ended up giving her the house as she had paid for it many times over in rent.

properties.name: My favourite football club
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 Home of Gillingham FC, currently languishing in mid-table in English League 1.Followed them for 25 years through the few highs and many lows. Will this be there home for much longer, we must wait and see....

properties.name: My favourite place to shop
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 The largest shopping centre in the south east and by far the best - so much nicer than Lakeside

properties.name: Our Favourite Local Restaurant - The Barn
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 OK, so it is not cheap, but you get what you pay for. Set in a jumble of rooms in a lovely old building, this place specialise in what I would call modern british food. We only eat here on our anniversary, but have yet to have a bad word to say against it

properties.name: Outstanding Seafood - Whitstable Harbour
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974Best local place for fresh seafood, around the harbourside there is an indoor market as well stalls selling most types of fish, but speacilising in the local oysters which are fantastic. There is also the Crab and Winkle restaurant which is always heaving in summer. A great place to come and chill out in the summer

properties.name: Roy and Emma's House
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974A 20 minute walk from our house, mainly uphill which is never good news. Roy and Emma moved here in the back end of 2005. The live here with their daughter Jessica (Dan\'s god-daughter) and their cat Delilah. It was through Roy and Emma that Dan and I met

properties.name: Where Dan works
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974Dan manages a care home for adults with severe learning difficulties. He has held this position for over a year now, and although it is very stressful it times, he finds his job ultimately very rewarding.

properties.name: Where I have studied - IPAG Business School, Nice
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 4 boulevard carabacel, nice, france

properties.name: Where I live
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974I bought this place back in 1999 and have lived here ever since. It is a standard 3 bedroomed Victorian terrace situated in a quiet cul-de-sac. In Ocotber 2004, my partner, Dan, moved in and was swiftly followed in August 2005 by Keith and Hamish - our 2 cats

properties.name: Where I lived in Paris
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974

properties.name: Where I met Dan
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974It was New Year\'s Eve 2003, and it was a fancy dress party round Roy and Emma\'s previous house. I was a pirate and he was Clyde (from Bonnie and Clyde). Our eyes met over cans of beer and sausage rolls etc. etc.

properties.name: Where I used to live - Lucca, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974I lived /worked here in from September 1998 for approximately 9 months - I was installing a new software system and training the users at the same time. As it was Italy, this process probably took 3 months longer than it should, but I was not complaining. It was a typical Tuscan appartment with green shuttered windows and overlooked a pretty little piazza with an amzing pizzeria only metres away. I was suddenly very popular for those 9 months...,,

properties.name: Where I was born
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974I was born in Wegberg, Germany in October 1974. My dad was in the army at the time and we were stationed just down the road in RAF Wildenrath - from what I know, there is no long a British army base here anymore.

properties.name: Where I went to Infants School
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 Delce Infants School between the ages of 5-7, or something like that anyway.

properties.name: Where I went to Junior School
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 Delce Junior School was where I went between the ages of 7-11, when I was not living on an army base somewhere

properties.name: Where I went to Secondary School
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 I studied at Chatham Grammar School for Boys unti June 1993, when, having taken my A-Levels, I left for the University of Greenwich

properties.name: Where I work
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974I work for TietoEnator UK, which was formerly Pentec Ltd until April 2005. I work in the field of software support and training in a business unit called Forest & Energy, specialising in software relating the paper manufacturing process. I have been working here since July 1997, my one and only job since leaving university

properties.name: Where my Parents live
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 My parents, Pam and Ray live here with their 5 dogs. I lived here too from 1987, when they bought house, until I moved out 10 years later.

properties.name: Where my sister lives
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974My sister, Jules, her husband Fintan and baby Mabel live in a 3 bedroomed semi-detached house in Lee which I believe to be in the London borough of Lewisham, but don\'t quote me on it. This area is close to Greenwich and Blackheath, which are two of the nicest areas in South East London. Lee itself is nothing but houses really....It is about a 45 minute zip up the A2 from my house

properties.name: Where my work has taken me - Park Hotel, Kilmarnock
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974 I started on a new software project, working for a UPM paper mill on the west coast of Scotland at the end of 2007. This hotel has been my base so and very nice it is to. Located next to Kilmarnock FC football ground, you get to eat your fab Scottish breakfast overlooking the pitch. Thoroughly recommended if you are in the area and needing a hotel

properties.name: Where our friend Charlotte lives
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974

properties.name: Where our friend Duncan lives
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974

properties.name: Where we go the Gym
properties.description: Posted by Gary1974  We have been members of the Waterfront Gym for since March 2005. We try to go 4 times a week, but invariably we end up going only once or twice. That could be the reason as to why the weight has not shifted......
